title: Downton Abbey, Final Season: Fun & Games Masterpiece
text: On the field or at the table--Team Downton steps up to the plate! Downton Abbey, the Final Season, premieres Sunday, January 3, 2016 at 9/8c on MASTERPIECE on PBS. #DowntonPBS
